Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: These herbs are relatively fresh, and tied with a green cord. A small tag reads: Medicinal Herbs - Ingest only if injured.
a bunch of herbs with a small tag
Various sized, relatively fresh leaves adorn the herbs.
A small tag on the bunch of herbs reads: Medicinal Herbs - Injest only if injured.

Base:InitialProperties.Base:InitialProperty: "if \$prop(actor.trait:wound-count) \>= 1 then emit.actor You injest the herb, it has a minty flavor that makes you want to gag. The urge soon passes, and when it does, you realize the pain from your \$prop(actor.trait:woundname) wound is significantly lessened. (OOC: You have used a medicinal herb that has NOT healed you. It is only a pain reliever, for roleplaying purposes. The effects last 30 minutes.)"

"if \$prop(actor.trait:wound-count) \>= 1 then emit.audience \$brief(actor) places the herbs in \$prop(actor.trait:possessive) mouth and chews them carefully. After a moment of looking like \$prop(actor.trait:nominative) wants to gag, \$brief(actor) calms down significantly, and looks to be in less pain from \$prop(actor.base:possessive) \$prop(actor.trait:woundname) wound.)"

"if \$prop(actor.trait:wound-count) = 0 then emit.actor The herb has a strong mint taste, that makes you want to gag. After a moment of trying to suppress this urge, you fail, and gag. (OOC : you have eaten a herb that has not agreed with your condition.)"

"if \$prop(actor.trait:wound-count) = 0 then emit.audience \$brief(actor) places the herbs in \$prop(actor.trait:possessive) mouth and chews them carefully. After a moment of looking like \$prop(actor.trait:nominative) wants to gag... :: delay 3 :: emit.Audience \$prop(actor.trait:nominative) gags in a spectacular fashion."

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "if \$prop(actor.trait:wound-count) \>= 1 then emit.actor You injest the herb, it has a minty flavor that makes you want to gag. The urge soon passes, and when it does, you realize the pain from your \$prop(actor.trait:woundname) wound is significantly lessened. (OOC: You have used a medicinal herb that has NOT healed you. It is only a pain reliever, for roleplaying purposes. The effects last 30 minutes.)"

"if \$prop(actor.trait:wound-count) \>= 1 then emit.audience \$brief(actor) places the herbs in \$prop(actor.trait:possessive) mouth and chews them carefully. After a moment of looking like \$prop(actor.trait:nominative) wants to gag, \$brief(actor) calms down significantly, and looks to be in less pain from \$prop(actor.base:possessive) \$prop(actor.trait:woundname) wound.)"

"if \$prop(actor.trait:wound-count) = 0 then emit.actor The herb has a strong mint taste, that makes you want to gag. After a moment of trying to suppress this urge, you fail, and gag. (OOC : you have eaten a herb that has not agreed with your condition.)"

"if \$prop(actor.trait:wound-count) = 0 then emit.audience \$brief(actor) places the herbs in \$prop(actor.trait:possessive) mouth and chews them carefully. After a moment of looking like \$prop(actor.trait:nominative) wants to gag... :: delay 3 :: emit.Audience \$prop(actor.trait:nominative) gags in a spectacular fashion."

X[M] EmitTo(\$actor, "You injest the herb, it has a strong minty flavor that makes you almost want to gag. The urge soon passes, and when it does, you realize any pain you had is significantly lessened. OOC: You have used a medicinal herb that has NOT healed you. It is only a pain reliever, for roleplaying purposes. The effects last 30 minutes."); EmitIn(\$actor."base:environment", Describe(\$actor) + " places the herbs in " + \$actor."trait:possessive" + " mouth and chews. After a moment of looking like " + \$actor."trait:nominative" + " wants to gag, " + \$actor."trait:nominative" + " calms down significantly, and looks to be in less discomfort from " + \$actor."trait:possessive" + " pains.", \$actor);

X[M] EmitTo( \$actor, "As you crush your herbs they give off a strong almost unpleasant minty odor."); EmitIn( \$actor."base:environment", ""+Describe(\$actor)+ " crushes " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " herbs. They give off a strong almost unpleasant minty scent.", \$actor );

X[M] EmitTo( \$actor, "You barely taste the herb, it has a strong minty flavor that makes you almost want to gag. The urge soon passes, and when it does, you realize any pain you had is slightly lessened. OOC: You have used a medicinal herb that has NOT healed you. It is only a pain reliever, for roleplaying purposes. The effects last 10 minutes."); EmitIn( \$actor."base:environment", ""+Describe(\$actor)+ " nibbles " + \$actor."trait:possessive" + " bunch of herbs. After a moment of looking like " + \$actor."trait:nominative" + " wants to gag, " + \$actor."trait:nominative" + " calms down slightly, and looks to be in a bit less discomfort from " + \$actor."trait:possessive" + " pains.", \$actor );

X[M] EmitTo( \$actor, "It has a strong minty smell that is almost unpleasant."); EmitIn( \$actor."base:environment", ""+Describe(\$actor)+ " smells " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " bunch of herbs.", \$actor );
